com.siperian.sif.message.mrm

Class LinkRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.SiperianRequest
      • com.siperian.sif.message.SiperianObjectRequest
        • com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.LinkRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SiperianObjectUidProvider, Serializable
    Deprecated.

    public class LinkRequest
extends SiperianObjectRequest
    The Link API links two or more base object records using the specified groupRecordKey as the group id. Unlike a merge operation, when records are linked, the original base object records continue to exist and the cross reference records are not directly associated with the grouping record. However, the cross reference records are grouped together in a link group with the rowid of the groupRecordKey specified in the LinkRequest. If the records specified for linking have been previously linked, then nothing is changed and the API returns a success message.

    In order to be able to use the Link API on a base object, the base object must first be configured to be a link style base object instead of a merge style base object. This option can be configured in the schema manager of the Hub Console.

    In order to use a link group, the GetBVT API must be invoked. This retrieves the best version of truth (BVT) for the specified link group accounting for the combined cross reference records of all base object records in the link group.

    The Link API performs the same function as the Autolink batch process. However, there are two differences to point out in the resulting link data. If a match rule is marked as an automerge rule, the Autolink batch process will set the auto_link_ind field to 1 in the LINK table. However, the API call sets the indicator to 0 regardless of the match rule's automerge setting. Additionally, if the setMatchRuleUid() parameter is not specified, then the Link API sets the match rule to "ASSERT". However, the Autolink batch process will not link any records that have not previously been matched on a match rule.

    Required Parameters:

    • SiperianObjectUid - Specifies the base object or package that contains the record(s) to link. The base object, or the parent base object of the package, must be a link style base object.
    • GroupRecordKey - The rowid of the record represented by this record key will be used as the group id for the link group created in this request.
    • RecordKeys - for the set of records that will be linked into a link group with the group id specified by setGroupRecordKey()

    Optional Parameters:

    • MatchRuleUid - The SiperianObjectUid of the match rule that was used to match the records that are being linked by this request.
    Usage Example:

    LinkRequest request = new LinkRequest();
    request.setSiperianObjectUid("PACKAGE.PARTY_UPDATE");
    RecordKey groupRecordKey = new RecordKey();
    groupRecordKey.setRowid("782");
    request.setGroupRecordKey(groupRecordKey);
    RecordKey linkRecordKey = new RecordKey();
    linkRecordKey.setRowid("123");
    request.getRecordKeys().add(linkRecordKey);
    LinkResponse response = (LinkResponse)sipClient.process(request);
    See Also:
    GetBvtRequest, SiperianObjectRequest, SiperianObjectUidProvider, RecordKey, UnlinkRequest, Serialized Form

    API Pair: LinkResponse

    API Group: Data

      • getGroupRecordKey

        public RecordKey getGroupRecordKey()
        Deprecated. 
        See corresponding setter method for details.

        Returns:
        The groupRecordKey that represents the record to group on.

      • setGroupRecordKey

        public void setGroupRecordKey(RecordKey groupRecordKey)
        Deprecated. 
        Set the RecordKey object that references the grouping record. The grouping record is the record that all other records are linked into. The rowid of the grouping record becomes the group id for the link group created.

        Parameters:
        groupRecordKey - The groupRecordKey that represents the record to group on.

      • getMatchRuleUid

        public String getMatchRuleUid()
        Deprecated. 
        See corresponding setter method for details.

        Returns:
        The matchRuleUid for the match rule that caused the match between the records being linked.

      • setMatchRuleUid

        public void setMatchRuleUid(String matchRuleUid)
        Deprecated. 
        Set the SiperianObjectUID of the match rule that found the match between the records being grouped. A match rule UID is specified as "[base object physical name]|[match rule set]|[match rule number]" and is case sensitive. This field is optional and does not need to be set for the LinkRequest to succeed. If the no match rule is specified, then the Link API sets the match rule to "ASSERT".

        Parameters:
        matchRuleUid - The matchRuleUid for the match rule that caused the match between the records being linked.

      • getRecordKeys

        public List getRecordKeys()
        Deprecated. 
        See corresponding setter method for details.

        Returns:
        The list of recordKeys that are to be linked with the groupRecordKey.

      • setRecordKeys

        public void setRecordKeys(List recordKeys)
        Deprecated. 
        Set the list of record keys corresponding to record that will be linked into the grouping record.

        Parameters:
        recordKeys - The list of recordKeys that are to be linked with the groupRecordKey.
